column1: Clean unnecessary logs from both local container and neighboring containers.
Remove temporary files from both local container and neighboring containers.
Clear cache directories from both local container and neighboring containers.
Optimize disk usage by removing redundant packages and dependencies.
Transfer large files between containers using SSH to balance disk space.
Clean Docker Containers: Remove unused images, containers, volumes, and networks.
Remove Temporary Files: Delete unnecessary temporary files from /tmp and user-specific temp directories.
Optimize Log Files: Compress or rotate log files located in /var/log to save space.
Clear Browser Cache: If applicable, clear cache and cookies from web browsers installed in the containers.
Check Neighbouring Containers: SSH into neighbouring containers to identify and clean similar directories.
Clear Browser Cache: If applicable, clear browser cache and cookies.
